tool_description: API to validate QR Bill data and generate Swiss QR bills in SVG, PDF or PNG formats.
name: Swiss QR Bill
title: Swiss QR Bill

api_list.name: /qrbill/validate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://swiss-qr-bill.p.rapidapi.com/qrbill/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "swiss-qr-bill.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /qrbill/generate/language/{language}/format/{format}/size/{size}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://swiss-qr-bill.p.rapidapi.com/qrbill/generate/language/de/format/pdf/size/a4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "swiss-qr-bill.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
